__metadata.note: No dedicated resolutions section was found on the official Zamboanga City Government website (zamboangacity.gov.ph). City Council resolutions may be integrated with ordinances or require direct request from the Sangguniang Panlungsod office.

__pendingItems.verificationNeeded: Direct request from Sangguniang Panlungsod or City Secretary's Office
__pendingItems.expectedContent: Resolutions typically cover commendations, recognitions, requests to national agencies, and policy recommendations
